Item 1: Welcome to the Flexway Workout system. Through this instructional recording, we will teach you simple yet effective methods of staying fit right in your own home. Our first workout session includes leg, arm, and core exercises. Before we start, please be sure you are wearing comfortable clothing and have a suitable space available.

I’m honored to introduce Ms. Elena Clark, the guest speaker for this year’s Technology Conference. Ms. Clark is the founder of Valton Technologies. Her company is known for innovation, environmental awareness, and customer service. Under her guidance, it has grown from a small business to a large corporation with hundreds of employees. Now, let’s welcome Ms. Clark to the stage.

Item 4.text: Question 8: I know that our first event in August is on August 5th. Item 5: Express an opinion Do you agree or disagree with the following statement? For job seekers, it is important to show a sense of humor during a job interview. Give reasons or examples to support your opinion.
